mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM devops_job dd WHERE dd.env_id=#{envId} AND dd.name=#{name}

select dj.*, der.id as env_resource_id, der.resource_detail_id, deco.command_type, deco.`status` AS command_status, deco.error from devops_job dj left join devops_env_resource der on (dj.env_id = der.env_id and dj.name = der.name and der.kind = 'Deployment') left join devops_env_command deco ON (deco.id = dj.command_id)
dj.env_id = #{envId}
and dj.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and instance_id != null
